data.eml:eml: Redescription of Proformica nasuta (Nylander, 1856) (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) using an integrative approach

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Christophe Galkowski, Claude Lebas, Philippe Wegnez (2017): Redescription of Proformica nasuta (Nylander, 1856) (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) using an integrative approach. European Journal of Taxonomy 290: 1-40, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2017.290
